song.title: Legomania
song.info:
1st place in combined demo compo at Assembly 2003
Lyrics:
Fly fly brother red, close to home you will get, Boost boost more speed, just another sci-fi geek! Swim swim brother green, where have you been? Smile smile don't frown, or you might suddenly drawn! We are not like the others, we are the famous Lego brothers, Brother red green and blue, sticking together like glue, Drive drive brother blue, keep your hat on, don't catch the flue, Faster faster, keep the motor running, brick walls are very stunning!
